hero.title: Computer Science Student
hero.description: Passionate Computer Science student with hands-on experience in systems programming, web development, and network architecture. Skilled in multiple programming languages with a strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, and software design principles.

bankSimulator.title: Bank Utilities Simulator
bankSimulator.description: Comprehensive banking system simulation built in pure C, implementing core data structures like stacks, queues, and linked lists. Features account management, transaction processing, and demonstrates advanced memory management.

videogameShop.title: Videogame Vending Shop
videogameShop.description: Complex C program simulating a game store with advanced memory management, sophisticated algorithms, and callback functions. Demonstrates deep understanding of C programming and project organization.

emailSystem.title: Client-Server Email System
emailSystem.description: Distributed application using Python and Java with socket programming. Server processes username/length requests and generates corresponding email addresses, showcasing network programming skills.

coffeeShop.title: Coffee Shop Landing Page
coffeeShop.description: Responsive web landing page for a coffee shop built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Clean design focusing on user experience and modern web development practices.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: I'm always eager to learn, collaborate on interesting projects, and connect with fellow developers and industry professionals.
contact.footer: Built with React and Tailwind CSS.
